page.title: 04Description of Parbold
page.content: {Landscape:} Parbold is a residential village with many of the inhabitants in the higher-income brackets. To the south of the village lies some agricultural land but lack of open land was noticed in the village itself. It is an attractive village situated on the slopes of Parbold Hill, upon which is Parbold Hill Quarry, whose stone workings have left some ugly scars. The gritstone was in great demand for the building of churches and other important public buildings. The Hill itself gives magnificent views and is a popular stopping-off point for visitors. {Population:}The village has grown in recent years to an estimated population of about 3,000 people: one thousand of them are under 18; about 150 over 18.
